Title: Relates to special districts for ambulance services
Summary: Relates to the establishment of special districts for general ambulance services in any county, city, town or village located within the Adirondack park.
LawCode: Amd ยง122-b, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the establishment of special districts for general ambulance services within the Adirondack park
